div.head: 胎動迫心
div.div: fetal movement pressing against the heart

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: fetal movement pressing against the heart

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi shang chong xin 子上衝心 , a child rises and clashes with the heart. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ai 艾 quotes Zi mu mi lu 子母秘錄 : 胎動迫心 , 作痛 , “ Fetal movement pressing against the heart : it causes pain”.
